title: Ip disappearing
body: My Summoner name is Sephiorth Hatasi, On Friday, April 21, 2017, I was going to buy Rakan using my influence points. My influence points disappeared, which made me worried because I earned it. I was wondering if you could help me out and fix this problem I am having. Contact me at Jinthesavage@gmail.com.

replies.body: You might be having a slight problem with this weird visual IP bug we've been seeing. The number in our system is correct, but for some reason, it's not being updated correctly on your end. I went ahead and manually synced up your IP totals, so you should see the right amount now.
It's not the amount I had but it can do thank you for your help. ;(
